How do I enter Verus CLI commands on different operating systems?

On Windows, enter the commands as shown without the surrounding quotation marks. On Linux and MacOS, precede the commands without surrounding quotation marks with `./`. For example, the Windows command `verus listtransactions` would become `./verus listtransactions` on Linux or MacOS.
